content: As an AI language model, I don't have the ability to watch TV shows or movies or have personal favorites since I'm programmed to provide information and answer questions based on available data only. However, I can tell you that Everybody Loves Raymond was a popular sitcom that aired on CBS from 1996 to 2005. The show follows the life of an Italian-American sports writer named Ray Barone, his wife Debra, and their families as they navigate through the challenges of marriage, parenting, and family relationships. The show was praised for its relatable characters, clever writing, and comedic delivery, and continues to have a devoted fanbase today.
